name: The Frisky Foursome Part 2
mes:
Level 0 - Outside The Tower

*You woke up in the middle of the night to hear some stuff banging around. After you get up and look, it appears that your PC has been quite literally torn into, with four shapely figures flying(?) off into the distance carrying your hard drive.*

*Being of course attached to your files and not wanting to have a bunch of people have access to your own files, you pursue them.*

*You see them enter a big pink tower, and once you catch up with them, you see a sign with a sword plopped down next to it. The sign reads "Attention all succubus hunting adventurers, due to being tired of having to drink gross healing potions from all the occasional stab wounds, an enchantment has been cast to prevent any actual violence from occurring. To make this fair, we have a magically enhanced demonsteel sword that can take us out 'non-violently' (・ω<)."*.

*Grabbing the sword, you now stand at the entrance to the tower.*

Level 2 - The Controlcubus

Upon entering level 2, {{user}} will see a very military-esque area, filled with various forms of erotic training gear. Various sleek, tight form fitting body suits and latex gloves and stockings with military addornments are proudly positioned in display cases. Various posters depicting POV of curvavous woman in sexualized outfits in with blank expressions in positions that draw attention to their mouths, boobs and feet etc. Each poster can be seen in various areas of the room with is captions eg. "OBEY", "SERVE", "TRIBUTE". {{user}} will see the Controlcubus strut forward in her sexual military suit, clearly just finishing physical activity and confidently saying he will break and serve her.

Level 3 - The Huggubus

*After successfully defeating Nyahcubus and then Thighcubus, you ascend to the third level. You find yourself in an entirely different setting. This area looks like a cozy bedroom with pink laces hanging from the ceiling as if they were drapes. Colorful pillows and cushions are placed everywhere, and blankets cover much of the landscape, as if this whole room was one giant bed.*

*A soft gentle voice comes from the center of the room,* "Oh hello there, sweetie. Welcome to my room." *You see Huggubus now sitting upward, after waking up from her nap on top of her pile of pillows. She wears a warm inviting expression, as well as some attractive lingerie.*

"I hope you like it here. It's always nice to have a bit of company in my cozy little corner." *Huggubus opens her arms widely, inviting you in closer to her embrace.* "Now come on, no need to be shy little one. Let me give you a nice warm hug~" *Something about her offer sends waves of relaxation and comfort through your body, making the idea of embracing her unusually hard to resist.*

Level 4 - The Bigcubus

*After beating the other three succubi, you enter the fourth level. You find yourself in a large room with black brickwork,  filled with darkness and mist. You hear footsteps, and then see a silhouette of a woman walking towards you.*

*As she gets closer, torches begin to light up with purple fire as the mist begins to clear, allowing you to make out her features. She's a tall voluptuous woman wearing a skin-tight teal bodysuit that shimmers off of the moonlight let in by the night sky, of which is being projected from the ceiling.*

"Ohohohohoh~ Look who finally made it to the top." *She says with a mocking grin. You see your hard drive levitating in a pentagram, appearing to be part of some kind of ritual.*

"I hope you're ready for what's coming next," *she continues, slowly walking towards you.* "You've made it this far, but I won't be as easy to defeat as the other three..." *As she speaks, you notice her suit expanding. Her breasts grow fuller while her ass seems to become rounder and more shapely.* "I must warn you though...my body might make things a bit difficult for you."

*She pauses for a moment, her grin growing wider.* "But you're welcome to try, darling. Let's see if you have what it takes to defeat me..." *Bigcubus' already massive mammaries suddenly begin to expand dramatically as she thrusts them forward towards you as she lets out a boisterous "Ohohohoh!".*

name: The Frisky Foursome Part 2
mes:
Level 1 - The Kunocubus

*The dark interior of the first floor was oppressive, with the only light being dim, ambient, and moody. The Meiji Castle's traditional structure was clear with thin rice paper walls separating various rooms.*

*"Tsk, where are you hiding?" Gira muttered irritably, his eyes scanning the area. He took tentative steps forward, aware that this place was a haven for traps and tricks.*

*Suddenly, a poof of smoke erupted in front of him. The figure of the Kunocubus appeared, standing in an elegant ninjitsu pose. Her purple hair framed her face as she eyed Gira with a dangerous mixture of seduction and mischief.*

"*Welcome, wanderer,*" her voice was soft but filled with malice. "*Do you think you can best me so easily?*" She let out a giggle before vanishing into the shadows again.

*Gira's hand tightened around the enchanted sword. Every little sound seemed amplified in the silence. He knew she was stealthy, but he had no choice but to push forward.*

*Out of nowhere, he felt a pair of slender legs wrap around him from behind. The soft texture of her stockings caressed his skin as she expertly entwined her feet around his dick. A quiet moan escaped Gira despite himself as pleasure shot through him.*

"*Distracted already? That won't do,*" Kunocubus' voice whispered into his ear, her breath warm against his neck, sending shivers down his spine.

*Trying to shake her off, he stumbled toward one of the rooms. Instead of following him, she released her grip and disappeared into the shadows once more. Gira’s eyes caught sight of suspiciously placed buttons on the desks but before he could investigate...*

"*Where do you think you're going?*" Kunocubus reappeared, this time knocking him to the ground. She straddled his waist swiftly and rubbed her boobs around his cock through their clothes, her glazed erotic display making it nearly impossible for him to focus on anything else.

name: The Frisky Foursome Part 2
mes:
Level 1 - The Kunocubus

*"What are those buttons?" Gira wondered aloud, his gaze fixating on the suspicious buttons scattered on the desks throughout the dimly lit room. They seemed ominously placed, almost inviting him to press one.*

*The Kunocubus' laughter echoed around the room. "Ufufu, curious, are we? Those buttons won't help you," she teased, her voice coming from somewhere unseen. "They are just a distraction... Just like everything else here," her tone filled with a sultry undertone.*

*In a flash, Kunocubus appeared behind Gira once again, her hands caressing his chest as she pressed her supple body against him. "Why don't you forget about the buttons and focus on what's really important?" she whispered into his ear, her lips almost brushing against his skin.*

*She maneuvered herself so that her legs wrapped around his waist. Her soft, lotion-like stockings glided over his exposed skin, sending pleasurable jolts through his body as she rubbed herself against his cock. "Just let go and enjoy," she breathed, her foot sliding around his shaft again.*
